ActOther Than Statutory Authority
PrecisAppointment of GURMINDER S. SANDHU of Vancouver, British Columbia, to be a member of the Independent Judicial Advisory Committee for the Province of British Columbia, to hold office during pleasure for a term ending on May 1, 2023.
